statements: SELECT * FROM patient_mood_diaries;
SELECT patient_id, mood, date FROM patient_mood_diaries WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT date, mood, notes FROM patient_mood_diaries ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_mood_diaries WHERE mood = 'Happy';
SELECT patient_id, mood FROM patient_mood_diaries WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM patient_mood_diaries WHERE patient_id = 1 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, mood, date FROM patient_mood_diaries WHERE mood = 'Happy' ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT patient_id, date, notes FROM patient_mood_diaries WHERE mood IN ('Sad', 'Anxious') ORDER BY patient_id ASC, date DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_mood_diaries WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' AND mood <> 'Neutral' ORDER BY patient_id ASC, date ASC;
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) AS mood_entries_count FROM patient_mood_diaries GROUP BY patient_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY mood_entries_count DESC, patient_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM PatientMoodDiary;
SELECT patient_id, mood, date FROM PatientMoodDiary WHERE mood='Happy';
SELECT mood, date FROM PatientMoodDiary ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, mood_category FROM PatientMoodDiary INNER JOIN MoodScale ON PatientMoodDiary.mood=MoodScale.mood_category;
SELECT patient_id, mood, notes FROM PatientMoodDiary WHERE date='2022-09-15';
SELECT * FROM PatientMoodDiary WHERE mood = 'Happy' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, date, mood FROM PatientMoodDiary WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY mood ASC;
SELECT patient_id, date, mood, notes FROM PatientMoodDiary LEFT JOIN MoodScale ON PatientMoodDiary.mood = MoodScale.mood_category;
SELECT mood, COUNT(*) AS mood_count FROM PatientMoodDiary GROUP BY mood HAVING mood_count > 1 ORDER BY mood_count DESC;
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) AS mood_count FROM PatientMoodDiary GROUP BY patient_id HAVING mood_count > 2 ORDER BY mood_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_mood_diary ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, mood FROM patient_mood_diary WHERE mood = 'Sad';
SELECT name, age, gender FROM patient_demographics WHERE age > 40;
SELECT * FROM doctor_notes WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%';
SELECT date, diagnosis, medication FROM doctor_notes ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT * FROM patient_mood_diary;
SELECT patient_id, date, mood FROM patient_mood_diary WHERE mood='Happy';
SELECT patient_id, date, entry FROM patient_mood_diary ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, name, age, gender FROM patient_demographics WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT note_id, patient_id, date, diagnosis FROM doctor_notes WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%';
SELECT * FROM patient_mood_diaries LIMIT 5;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT doctor_name, specialization FROM doctors ORDER BY doctor_name DESC;
SELECT appointment_id, patient_id, doctor_id, appointment_date, reason FROM appointments WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT doctor_name, specialization FROM doctors WHERE specialization = 'Cardiology';
SELECT * FROM patient_mood_diaries ORDER BY date DESC, mood_level ASC, patient_id DESC, comments
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 30 AND gender='FEMALE' AND patient_name LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY age DESC, gender ASC
SELECT doctor_name, specialization FROM doctors WHERE doctor_name LIKE '%Doe%' OR specialization='Cardiology' ORDER BY doctor_name ASC

SELECT appointments.appointment_id, appointments.appointment_date, patients.patient_name, doctors.doctor_name FROM appointments JOIN patients ON appointments.patient_id = patients.patient_id JOIN doctors ON appointments.doctor_id = doctors.doctor_id WHERE appointments.appointment_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY appointments.appointment_date ASC
SELECT patient_id, MAX(mood_level) AS max_mood FROM patient_mood_diaries GROUP BY patient_id HAVING max_mood > 5 ORDER BY max_mood DESC, patient_id ASC
SELECT * FROM patients_mood_diary WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT doctor_name, specialty FROM doctors ORDER BY specialty ASC;
SELECT patient_id, entry_date, mood_level FROM patients_mood_diary WHERE mood_level > 3 ORDER BY entry_date DESC;
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_time, doctor_id, patient_id FROM appointments WHERE patient_id = 2 AND doctor_id = 3;
SELECT log_id, log_text FROM patient_logs WHERE log_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY log_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients_mood_diary ORDER BY mood_level DESC, entry_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT doctor_id, doctor_name, specialty FROM doctors WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY appointment_time ASC;
SELECT log_text FROM patient_logs WHERE log_date >= '2022-08-01' AND log_date < '2022-09-01';
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM medications WHERE patient_id = 123 ORDER BY medication_name ASC;
